com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.lde

Class PlainLauncher

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.servlet.WServlet
          • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.lde.TestServlet
            • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.lde.PlainLauncher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandaloneLauncher.MyLauncher

    public class PlainLauncher
extends TestServlet
    This class enables easy running of a shared WComponent instance in a Jetty servlet container for development and testing purposes.

    You need to set the class name of the WComponent you want to run. Do this by setting the parameter "bordertech.wcomponents.lde.component.to.launch" in your "local_app.properties" file. E.g. 

     ui.web.component.to.launch = com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.examples.picker.ExamplePicker
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Martin Shevchenko
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
